title: Cameron police say fatal shooting of man appears accidental
content:
CAMERON, W.Va. (AP) – Cameron police say the fatal shooting of a man by a 14-year-old boy appears accidental.
Police chief Michael Younger says the boy told police he thought the gun was unloaded.
Younger tells The Intelligencer and Wheeling News-Register that the boy shot 19-year-old James Russell Keyser in the forehead on Friday.
The investigation is continuing.
The boy wasn’t identified because he is a juvenile.
